title: Being a Lady of an Influential Family - Novel Updates
author: 凤轻
description:
As a man who has been devastated and robbed of his fiancee by his own brother, Fu Fengcheng plans to take revenge to the world.

He then married a woman named Leng Sa.

Fu Fengcheng: Since I’m already in hell,then I want everyone to go down with me!

Leng Sa: Why?

Fu Fengcheng: I want to get rid of all the people who stand in my way!

Leng Sa : Are you talking about me?

Fu Fengcheng: ….

Leng Sa: Go and take your medicine.>
